name: Webflow Color Importer
description:
Export your colors from Figma and import them directly into your Webflow projects with ease.


The Webflow Color Importer Plugin makes it easy to add your colors and resync them at any time. Simply install the Flowbase Chrome Extension and open our importer tool inside of webflow


Import them with our extension www.flowbase.co/extension


Features


  • Export all your color swatches (including their name and unique IDs) in one click
  • Import them directly to your Webflow project using the Flowbase Chrome Extension
  • Re-sync changes and updates at any time
